name: VersionAndroidManifest
description: Applies a version to an Android Manifest via the versionCode property based on the build number.
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for manifest files, can be root as it will find all files recursively

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to files, can be extraced from the build name 'Build HelloWorld_00.00.00000' format

inputs.name: VersionNameFormat
inputs.label: Version Name Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format of version number to apply as Version Name. Assumes starting from the beginning of the version number.

inputs.name: Injectversioncode
inputs.label: Inject Version Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: If True use the version code as it directly entered, do not generate it

inputs.name: VersionCodeFormat
inputs.label: Version Code Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the part(s) of the version number to use for the version code. This will concatenate these parts together to a single integer.

inputs.name: VersionCode
inputs.label: Version Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: An externally generated version code in range 1-2100000000 as required by Google Play Store.

inputs.name: Injectversion
inputs.label: Inject Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If True no regex processing will be done to the build number. The build number must format must match the requirements of the 'Version Name Pattern' and 'Version Code Pattern'

inputs.name: VersionRegex
inputs.label: Regex Filter to extract build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression filter to get build number from the build name.

inputs.name: OutputVersion
inputs.label: Version number used variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The actual version number extracted and used from the build number.
